item.title: Powershell: Listing activated clients on KMS server
item.description: If you are using a KMS server for activating servers and clients in your environment, you may have noticed that thereâ€™s really no obvious way to get a list of all the clients that have been activated by the KMS server. One way to get that overview is by using VAMT (http://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/hh824953.aspx), but since that tool is based on pulling info from clients and not from the KMS server it is not suitable for everyone.
